sentences.sContent: She threw off her cloak with an abandoned gesture.
sentences.sContent_eng: She threw off her cloak with an abandoned gesture.
sentences.sCn: 她以一种放纵的姿势脱掉了斗篷。

trans.tranOther: a warm piece of clothing like a coat without sleeves that hangs loosely from your shoulders
